short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced reporting and data export features for BigTime Time Tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides enhanced reports for users of BigTime Time Tracking who don't have access to reporting features (usually due to not having administrative access).  This extension will allow you to see your total hours by Project and Task for a specific time period and also export this data to Excel.  More features coming soon!
